trans-unit.source: Represents a layout control that aligns a bullet and another visual object.
trans-unit.target: Jelöli, hogy legyen a felsorolási és egy másik visual objektum elrendezés vezérlő.

trans-unit.source: BulletDecorator has two content properties: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.
trans-unit.target: BulletDecorator két tartalom tulajdonságokkal rendelkezik: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>és <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> property defines the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> to use as a bullet.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>tulajdonság határozza meg a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>a listajelként használandó.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> property defines a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> that visually aligns with the bullet.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>tulajdonság határozza meg a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, amely a felsorolási vizuálisan igazodik.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> always aligns with the first line of text when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> object is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>mindig igazodik a szöveg első sorában amikor az <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>objektum <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> object is not a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> aligns to the center of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: Ha a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>objektum nincs a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>igazítja a középre a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>objektum.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about layout of a BulletDecorator, see [How to: Create a BulletDecorator](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d9532e9a-a2a5-47b9-aa37-c36f841b34ae).
trans-unit.target: További információ a BulletDecorator elrendezés: [hogyan: hozzon létre egy BulletDecorator](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d9532e9a-a2a5-47b9-aa37-c36f841b34ae).

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows examples of BulletDecorator controls.
trans-unit.target: A következő ábrán BulletDecorator vezérlők példát.

trans-unit.source: ![3 BulletDecorators: CheckBox, RadioButton, TextBox](~/add/media/bulletdecorator.png "3 BulletDecorators: CheckBox, RadioButton, TextBox")
trans-unit.target: ![3 BulletDecorators: jelölőnégyzetet, a RadioButton objektum, szövegmező](~/add/media/bulletdecorator.png "3 BulletDecorators: jelölőnégyzetet, a RadioButton objektum, szövegmező")

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the default content arrangement behavior for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Felülbírálja az alapértelmezett tartalom elrendezéssel viselkedése a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> vezérlő.

trans-unit.source: The ArrangeOverride method determines the size and position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> objects.
trans-unit.target: A ArrangeOverride módszer határozza meg, a méretének és pozíciójának a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>és a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>objektumok.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> is aligned vertically with the first line of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> content.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>az első sort a függőleges igazítását a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>tartalom.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The available <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> to use to lay out the content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A rendelkezésre álló <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> tartalmának elrendezéséhez használatára a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> vezérlő.

trans-unit.source: The computed size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A számított mérete a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> vezérlő.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a háttér színét, egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> vezérlő.

trans-unit.source: The Background property defines the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> to use to fill the area within the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>.
trans-unit.target: A háttérben tulajdonság határozza meg a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>belül a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> terület kitöltéséhez használandó</xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush>

trans-unit.source: For some parent layout elements, the area that is defined for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> may extend beyond its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> content.
trans-unit.target: Egyes szülő elrendezés elemeknél, a rendszer megadott terület a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>túlnyúlik a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>és <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>tartalom.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> is the single child of a cell in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> control, the Background property applies to the whole cell.
trans-unit.target: Például ha a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>levő cella egyetlen gyermek egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>vezérlő, a háttér tulajdonság vonatkozik a teljes cella.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>

trans-unit.source: This occurs because the content in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> cell is stretched in all directions to fill the cell, by default.
trans-unit.target: Ez akkor fordul elő, mert a tartalom egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>cella van archiválva a felhőbe a cella kitöltésének minden irányban alapértelmezés szerint.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>

trans-unit.source: However, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>, the Background property only affects the actual content area of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>.
trans-unit.target: Azonban ha a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>tulajdonságot <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>a háttér-tulajdonság csak hatással van a tényleges tartalom területén <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can enclose the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element.
trans-unit.target: Másik lehetőségként is tegye a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>a egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>elem.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: ## Függőségtulajdonság adatai ||| |-|-| | Alkalmazásazonosító mezőben |} | | Metaadat-tulajdonságainak beállítása `true`|}, : |

trans-unit.source: The background color for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child*> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A háttérszínét a <> </> *> és <> </> *>, egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett érték <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Azonosítja a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background*>függőség tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object to use as the bullet in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a listajelként használandó objektum egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Bullet property is a content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> control and defines the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> to display as a bullet for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: A felsorolási tulajdonsága egy tartalmi tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>vezérlik, és határozza meg a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>a listajelként megjelenítéséhez a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>objektum.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>

trans-unit.source: The bullet that is defined by setting the Bullet property to a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is the first visual element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> control.
trans-unit.target: A felsorolás a felsorolási tulajdonság által meghatározott egy <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>az első visual elem egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>vezérlő.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: The single <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> element is the second visual element.
trans-unit.target: Az egyetlen <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>elem a második visual elem.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: ## XAML tulajdonság elemek használata``` ```

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> to use as the bullet.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> a listajelként használandó.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett érték <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the child element that is at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a gyermek elem, amely a megadott indexnél.

trans-unit.source: The visual child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> are the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: A vizuális gyermekelemei egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>vannak a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>és a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>Tulajdonságok.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>

trans-unit.source: The specified index for the child element.
trans-unit.target: A megadott index az alárendelt elem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> child element that is at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> gyermek elem, amely a megadott indexnél.

trans-unit.source: index is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: indexértéke 0-nál kisebb.

trans-unit.source: -or- index is greater than or equal to .
trans-unit.target: – vagy – index nagyobb vagy egyenlő .

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator for the logical child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Elemeinek lekérdezi számbavevő a logikai gyermeke a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> vezérlő.

trans-unit.source: The logical child elements for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> control include the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>vezérlő közé tartozik a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>és <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> a logikai alárendelt elemei

trans-unit.source: If you set both properties, they are enumerated in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Ha mindkét tulajdonság van beállítva, akkor a következő sorrendben számba: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of visual child elements is the same as the number of logical child elements.
trans-unit.target: Visual gyermek elemeinek száma megegyezik a logikai gyermeke elemek száma.

trans-unit.source: The enumerator that provides access to the logical child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A számbavevő, amely a logikai gyermekelemei hozzáférést biztosít a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> vezérlő.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett érték <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the default measurement behavior for the objects of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Felülbírálja az objektumok mérési alapértelmezés egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> vezérlő.

trans-unit.source: The upper <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> limit of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A felső <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> határérték a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The required <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control, based on the size of its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child*> objects.
trans-unit.target: A szükséges <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> a a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> vezérlő mérete alapján a <> </> *> és <> </> *> objektumok.

trans-unit.source: Renders the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ez a beállítás a tartalmát egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> vezérlő.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a <xref:System.Windows.Rect> structure that is sized for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> content.
trans-unit.target: Ezzel a módszerrel hoz létre egy <xref:System.Windows.Rect>struktúrában, amelynek a mérete a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>tartalom.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Rect>

trans-unit.source: This rectangular structure is displayed with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background%2A> color and no border.
trans-unit.target: A téglalap alakú struktúra jelenik meg a megadott <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background%2A>színét, szegély nélkül.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of visual child elements for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Visual gyermekelemek száma lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> vezérlő.

trans-unit.source: The VisualChildrenCount can be 0, 1, or 2.
trans-unit.target: A VisualChildrenCount 0, 1 vagy 2 lehet.

trans-unit.source: If either the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> element is defined, the VisualChildrenCount is 1.
trans-unit.target: Ha a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>vagy egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>elem által meghatározott, a VisualChildrenCount: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> element are defined, the VisualChildrenCount is 2.
trans-unit.target: Ha mindkét a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>és egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>elemben definiált, a VisualChildrenCount: 2.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of visual child elements is the same as the number of logical child elements.
trans-unit.target: Visual gyermek elemeinek száma megegyezik a logikai gyermeke elemek száma.

trans-unit.source: The number of visual elements that are defined for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A megadott visual elemek száma a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett érték a 0.
